attributes.action: All road users to take a 'driving license' and pay road tax
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
All road users as in cyclists and horse riders must take a test, proving that they know the rules and regulations of the Highway Code and on completion the will be given a license allowing them to use a taxed mode of transportation relevant to their license.
And as with motorists, Road Tax and Insurance will be compulsory. No ‘MOT’ is required, but working lights and clean reflectors must be on the cycle, saddle/bridal wear and the rider at all times.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
